body:
Recently ive been seeing alot of ppl w/ their nutella and nutella based food like this
(picture below), is it really that good? i mean im not much of a fan of chocolate spreads
but im willing to try if this gets decent or alot of positive feedback about Nutella

Nutella filled Donuts, Nutella Chocolate Chip cookies, Pancakes w/ Nutella ontop, or just
a spoonful of Nutella, etc.

replies.body:
I'm like you. 
I'm not a great fan of chocolate (as a whole), so I tend to have marmalade on my toast.
However occasionally I have Nutella, but only on toast, without butter. :3
Nutella on plain bread makes me sick. >.<

replies.body:
Nutella's good, but I personally don't think it's good enough to deserve all the hype it gets.. 
I mean, it tastes fine, and it's spreadable, but I'd just rather eat a doughnut or something than spread it on any pastries.
replies.body_tagged:

I mean, it tastes fine, and it's spreadable, but I'd just rather eat a doughnut or something than spread it on any pastries.

replies.body:
Nutellaaaaaaaaaa!

Its really awesome, especially for a chocoholic like me. I have it on toast, on bread, on pancakes and inside doughnuts. I love it's consistency and taste! I suggest you try it, as long as you have no nut allergies.
